Package io.github.jnodorp.jiffybox

Class JiffyBoxApi

java.lang.Object
io.github.jnodorp.jiffybox.JiffyBoxApi
public class JiffyBoxApi extends Object
This is the base class of the JiffyBox API. Usually it should be created only once. You have to specify the API token to use. Furthermore, it is possible to add a host, which is useful for testing purposes.
See Also:
